member.name: SYNCMGR_PROGRESS_STATUS
member.summary: Specifies the current progress status of a synchronization process. Used by .

member.name: SYNCMGR_PROGRESS_STATUS.SYNCMGR_PS_UPDATING
member.summary: The progress status is currently being updated by the handler.

member.name: SYNCMGR_PROGRESS_STATUS.SYNCMGR_PS_UPDATING_INDETERMINATE
member.summary: Ignore step parameters. The progress bar cycles from left to right on a timer internal to the sync folder. This is known as marquee mode.

member.name: SYNCMGR_PROGRESS_STATUS.SYNCMGR_PS_FAILED
member.summary: Indicates something went wrong during the synchronization.

member.name: SYNCMGR_PROGRESS_STATUS.SYNCMGR_PS_CANCELED
member.summary: The user canceled the synchronization before it completed. Upon receipt of this value, Sync Center updates the UI and enables the option to restart the sync for that item.

member.name: SYNCMGR_PROGRESS_STATUS.SYNCMGR_PS_DISCONNECTED
member.summary: The device being synchronized was disconnected before the sync completed..

member.name: SYNCMGR_PROGRESS_STATUS.SYNCMGR_PS_MAX
member.summary: Used only to declare the largest valid value in this enumeration. Do not use with .
